title: How can i get my phone to operate on a google version for android platform instead of using kernel
content: Certain apps for instance dont run the same and all my google apps ass in google drive google chrome and google wats app etc.all came with the phone but when i try to open it refers me to play store to download ..also i cant use my apps that use a flash extension..
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
